scripts.build: concurrently "cd cti-manager-server && yarn build" "cd cti-manager-web-ui && yarn build"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd cti-manager-server && yarn dev" "cd cti-manager-web-ui && yarn dev"
scripts.test: concurrently "yarn depcheck" "cd cti-manager-server && yarn test" "cd cti-manager-web-ui && yarn test"
scripts.start: yarn build && cd cti-manager-server && yarn start
scripts.restart: yarn build && cd cti-manager-server && yarn restart
